properties.name: Gallatown Gala & community group

properties.address: Gallatown Hub, Oswald Rd, Kirkcaldy KY1 3EZ
properties.description: The Warm Spaces Talking Cafe drop-ins will be a safe space for people to come along, meet new people, reduce their social isolation and have somewhere warm to share food with others while being able to chat and share stories and experiences. We would like to provide hot food at all 3 weekly drop ins and one of the weekly sessions will take the form of a "Community Meal" where anyone who attends can help prepare and cook the food before sitting down together at one big table and eating the food they have prepared. The other two sessions will also have hot food available, such as bacon rolls, soup and tea/coffee. The Warm Spaces Talking Cafes will have a development worker available to chat with and signpost to other services and support services such as Mental Health services, Welfare Support and Employability.

hours._text: Monday ; Tuesday 1pm-3pm; Wednesday ; Thursday ; Friday ; Saturday ; Sunday
